dialogue.text: Please ensure that [Error] and [Error] are either equipped, in your Armoury Chest, or in your inventory.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Upon doing so, you will become eligible to accept the quest “In Need of Adjustment.”

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: In order to accept the quest “In Need of Adjustment,” please ensure that [Error] is either equipped, in your Armoury Chest, or in your inventory.

dialogue.name: CRAFTER04653
dialogue.text: Another augmentation, is it? Certainly, certainly! I am equipped with every tool and material required to reforge your weaponry.

dialogue.name: CRAFTER04653
dialogue.text: ...Every material, that is, save for three pieces of extraordinarily rare achondrite. I do apologize for singing the same tune over and over, MistressMaster Surname, but I must ask that you supply this most precious resource yourself.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Chunks of amplifying achondrite can be obtained from Jubrunnah at the aetheryte plaza in Radz–at–Han.

dialogue.name: CRAFTER04653
dialogue.text: Still attempting to acquire the achondrite, are we? Please, take all the time you need. I am well compensated for standing idly at my station, day after day...after day.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Chunks of amplifying achondrite can be obtained from Jubrunnah at the aetheryte plaza in Radz–at–Han.

dialogue.name: CRAFTER04653
dialogue.text: Ah, you've acquired the achondrite! Pray unbuckle your weaponry that we might lavish it with our full artisanal attentions.

dialogue.name: CRAFTER04653
dialogue.text: By your expectant gaze, might I assume we are ready to proceed?

dialogue.name: CRAFTER04653
dialogue.text: Yes, these achondrite chunks are all suitably chunky. Let the augmentation process begin!

dialogue.name: MANDERVILALCHEMIST
dialogue.text: We shall now apply the Maxalamanderville coating. As you know, the oil's final composition will alter the paths of aetherial conductivity, and thus affect how your weaponry serves you in battle.

dialogue.name: MANDERVILALCHEMIST
dialogue.text: I must ask that you be quite accurate with─and committed to─your particular preferences.

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: What will you do?

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Adjust the attributes of your Manderville weaponry.

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Learn about Manderville weaponry attributes.

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Nothing.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You can choose three attributes to add to your newly augmented Manderville weaponry. One of these attributes will be set to a lower value than the other two.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Once you have adjusted the values to your liking, select “Confirm” to finalize your decision.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Resetting your weaponry's attributes will require an additional chunk of amplifying achondrite, so consider your choices carefully.

dialogue.name: MANDERVILALCHEMIST
dialogue.text: As you wish, MistressMaster Surname.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Done. A fine piece o' reforgin', if I do say so meself!

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Enjoy yer new [Error] an' [Error]!

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Enjoy yer new [Error]!

dialogue.name: CRAFTER04653
dialogue.text: Truly, 'tis another masterpiece! A testament to the fine-tuned harmony of our collaborative hammers!

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Clobberin' hammers is all well an' good, aye.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: But for the love o' Byregot... Would it kill ye to put on a pair o' bloody trousers?

dialogue.name: CRAFTER04653
dialogue.text: My lack of clothing is a conscious effort─one I must continue if I am to emulate Lord Godbert's masterful methodology.

dialogue.name: CRAFTER04653
dialogue.text: Why not try it yourself, Master Gerolt? Freeing oneself from the tyranny of socially acceptable apparel is a liberating experience, I can assure you.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Liberate meself, ye say...

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: So's I can join yer small-brained, smallclothes society!? Not in a million years!

dialogue.name: CRAFTER04653
dialogue.text: 'Tis a breathtaking work of art, built upon a solid foundation of cooperative craftsmanship!

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Aye, but...mostly on me smitty talents. The pair o' you should keep at it, though.

dialogue.name: CRAFTER04653
dialogue.text: 'Twould seem our toils are done for the day. Should you have other weaponry in need of augmentation, however, do not hesitate to call upon our services.

dialogue.name: CRAFTER04653
dialogue.text: A few moments' notice─and a few chunks of achondrite─is all we require.

dialogue.name: MANDERVILALCHEMIST
dialogue.text: As for simple readjustments, you need bring me but a single piece of the same amplifying achondrite. I shall see to it that your armaments' aetherial pathways are altered to your liking.
